name: 'Silly Voices' children's book
description:
Lovingly designed and written children's book that is as much for adults as it is kids. 

Unique stenciled illustrations offset by strong typographic design, this read aloud book will become an instant favourite. 

Handmade 32 page, staple bound book. Digital print with soft cover (21cmx21cm)

More information on the story here (book sold varies from pictured here) danmackey.co.uk/2012/06/06/silly-voices-making-a-childrens-book
